Thank you for visiting! I'm a PhD student in the [Department of Politics and International Relations](https://www.politics.ox.ac.uk/) at the University of Oxford.

I study how much people trust political authorities and politicians, why that changes, and whether it matters.

My research on how scandals affect trust in politics is forthcoming in the *British Journal of Political Science.*

You can also find me on [Google Scholar](‪Edmund Kelly‬ - ‪Google Scholar‬), [Twitter](https://x.com/edmundbkelly), and my [Oxford webpage](Edmund Kelly | DPIR (ox.ac.uk).
